description: This is the home you’ve been searching for! Enjoy an abundance of natural light with windows on three sides of this rarely available corner unit. Enjoy an open concept living/dining area with bedrooms located on opposite sides of the living area. The kitchen boasts gas cooking, plenty of countertop space and storage. This condo checks all the “must have” boxes with private roof deck space, deeded garage parking, and in unit washer/dryer. Located in South Boston’s premier luxury building, Port 45 offers impressive amenities including full time concierge, a well maintained gym with newly replaced equipment, dog spa, exceptional outdoor space and elegant club room. Come take a look. Open houses Saturday 12:30-1:30 and Sunday 1:00 - 2:00.

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Contact agent, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. Zillow does not endorse any real estate professionals. We may share information about your recent and future site activity with your agent to help them understand what you’re looking for in a home.

textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow. Zillow Premier Agent is an advertising program that helps connect customers to local real estate professionals. Zillow Premier Agent partners are paid advertisers and are not affiliated with Zillow, Inc. brokerage or any of its affiliates.
